ARTICLE.TITLE: Tenders to be published monthly: Makhura
ARTICLE.TEXT:
JOHANNESBURG - Gauteng Premier David Makhura says all awarded tenders will be published monthly.

Makhura says this will be done so that the public can hold government accountable, should any corruption take place.

The premier says criminal charges will be laid against anyone found to have been involved in tender scandals, whether it be government officials or normal companies.

The Gauteng Provincial Command Council briefed the media on the province's response to COVID-19 on Thursday.

- Coronavirus Hotline Number: 0800 029 999 from 8am to 4pm, Monday to Friday

Help protect your loved ones by sharing this official South African government COVID-19 service with your family, friends and community.

Send HI to 0600 123 456 on WhatsApp.

The NICD has another Clinician Hotline to improve #COVID19 communication and support for healthcare providers. The Clinician Hotline is 0800 11 1131, operating 24 hrs. The Public Hotline is 0800 029 999 also operating 24hrs.
